hero.title: One scan. One stamp. That's it.
hero.subtitle: No POS system. No special hardware. Your phone is all you need to stamp your customers in one second.

problem.title: Stamping should be invisible
problem.description: The customer pays, you look for the stamp, the card is at the bottom of the bag, the line grows. With a physical stamp, the act of rewarding loyalty slows down your service. And anything that slows service eventually disappears. Stamping should be as fast as contactless payment.

sections.title: Dedicated app
sections.description: The Stampeo app is lightweight and dedicated to scanning. Open the app, point the camera at the customer's QR code, and a stamp is added — with haptic confirmation. Total time: 1 second.

sections.title: Web scanner
sections.description: Don't want to install an app? Scan directly from your phone or tablet browser. Ideal for businesses using a shared tablet at the counter.

sections.title: Offline mode
sections.description: Works even without internet. Scans are saved locally and synced automatically when connection returns. No stamp is ever lost.

cta.title: Stamp in one second
cta.subtitle: Free app on iOS and Android. Web scanner available on all devices.

hero.title: Your customers actually read your messages. Finally.
hero.subtitle: Emails end up in spam. SMS is expensive. Wallet notifications appear directly on the lock screen — and 85% are read.

problem.title: The problem with traditional channels
problem.description: You have things to tell your customers. Except they don't hear you. Emails end up in spam (~20% read rate), SMS is intrusive and costly (~45%), app push requires installation (~30%). Wallet notifications reach ~85% read rate.

sections.title: Stamp notification
sections.description: "You earned a stamp! Only 7 more until your reward." Sent with every scan, the customer instantly knows their visit was recorded.

sections.title: Milestone notification
sections.description: "Only 2 more stamps! Your free coffee is almost here." Sent when the customer approaches the reward. Creates anticipation and motivates return visits.

sections.title: Reward notification
sections.description: "Congratulations! You've unlocked your reward." The moment of maximum satisfaction. The card clearly displays "REWARD READY".

cta.title: Messages your customers actually read
cta.subtitle: Join the founding program and start communicating with your customers through their wallet.

problem.title: What you don't know today
problem.description: How many regular customers do you have? How often do they come back? Who stopped coming? Which day is quietest? With paper cards, these questions have no answers. You're managing loyalty blind.

problem.description: Marc walks past your cafe every morning. But this morning, he's in a hurry. He doesn't think about his loyalty card with 8 out of 10 stamps. He goes to the Starbucks across the street, out of habit. The problem isn't competition. It's forgetting.
